utterances.utterance: -- this is really reminding Americans that we have this flood at the border that's sucking up state resources. And so I think it's just a dumb issue for them to harp on.

utterances.utterance: You and I have talked for years about how the Republicans don't create news events. They kind of talk at the voters. But this is brilliant because you have to cover it. Judge Cannon, Aileen Cannon, denied the DOJ's request for a partial stay of her decision to appoint that special master. utterances.speaker: DHILLON
utterances.utterance: Well, Judge Dearie was accepted by the DOJ as well after the Trump folks objected to their judges. Of course, a recent FISA judge has all the clearances necessary to look at all of those documents. And so she's checkmated the government on that issue. It's an excellent balanced order, and I don't think the 11th circuit is going to take issue with it.

utterances.speaker: INGRAHAM
utterances.utterance: Harmeet, this means that the investigation, at least temporarily, slows down.
